items.title: Venezuela's Maduro says US 'fabricating war' as it deploys world's largest warship
items.description: The deployment of the USS Gerald R Ford marks a major escalation in what the US says is a campaign to target drug traffickers.

items.title: Chief prosecutor says top official would not call China an enemy
items.description: Stephen Parkinson sets out why the case against two alleged spies was dropped in a letter to MPs.

items.title: Thailand's former queen Sirikit dies aged 93
items.description: The mother of King Vajiralongkorn passed away "peacefully" on Friday night, according to the Thai Royal Household.

items.title: McLaren 'already behind' as Verstappen sets practice pace
items.description: Red Bull driver Max Verstappen goes fastest in the second practice session at the Mexico City Grand Prix.

items.title: 'One out... by mistake' and Prince Andrew 'dislodged'
items.description: The fallout after a former asylum seeker who assaulted a 14-year-old girl was mistakenly released from prison leads the papers.
